title: PES EC CAMPUS ADMISSION
content: i have got a kcet rank of 5100 this year , and i might not get pes cs in rr campus but will get cse in in ec campus and might also get cse in bms or jss mysore , so during the option entry which should i prefer more bms or jss above pes ec campus for cse and also this year 1480 seats in both campuses for cse in pes but in bms its 1200 seats , so will it affcet my placements as comepetions gets increased , plzzz help me  my option entry s going on , and also plz give the order for prefernce of colleges of pes ec ,bmsce , jss for cse branch

comments.body:
Pes ec campus> bms > jss ( if you are more academically inclined and care about placements ) 
Bms > pes ec > jss ( if you want relatively easier academics) 
Since bms increased seats it will be interesting to see their placement statistics , pes is already proven with that number of seats and gives a good ROI , rest choice is yours..
I also might get re campus cse with aiml specialization, as it is a new branch introduced, will it be risky for me to go as I heard first batch of any new course is always riskyÂ

See , although the syllabus remains same upto 70-75% , choosing CSE - AI ML will include lot of maths. Core CSE will always give you the flexibility to be relevant in AI ML or AI DS or any other specialization field so better to choose core CSE..
Late question but is pes ec academically lenient than jss?
Nope mate , both RR and EC campus follow similar circulum, there is no way for you to feel it's more lenient that jss ( jss being affiliated to VTU) .
